list_definition.definition: a long flat piece of wood, metal etc, balanced on a central support so that one end of it goes up as the other goes down

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The boy fell off the seesaw in the park.

list_definition.definition: to move up and down like a seesaw

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The boat seesawed on the crest of the wave.
